title: Consulting and outsourcing for owners of gaming business
talent_text: We connect companies with talented execution teams, help companies grow and solve business problems of market leaders
specialists_text: We provide remote specialists in IT, design, project management, marketing, and sales
name: Name
form_team: 5 days only to set up a team
privacy: I have read and agree to the terms of the
market_research: Market research and generation of business ideas for the new markets
instruments: Collecting market data about clients, consumers, clients and competitors through effective instruments. We create hypotheses, find insights and make market forecasts
recruiting: Recruiting. Search of applicants and hiring process
recruiting_text: Replacing junior HR level to ensure an sufficient inflow of candidates for a required vacancy. We look for applicants, cover communication and interview stages and find best candidates worldwide
candidates: Search for relevant candidates and communication with them
style: We create project design, creatives for promotion, landing pages, email designs and corporate presentations. From video production and 3D modeling to creation of unique characters, we cover full scope of design services
partnership: Analyzing the market and choosing the best partnership arrangements. We create strategies and propose proven and effective arbitration teams while controlling, analyzing and optimizing the budget
IGaming: iGaming Management helps companies find leaders in their niches. We have more than 100 000 bloggers in our database and support the clients from choosing a blogger to a proven result. We handle communication, ad placement and monitor the effectiveness of the promotion campaigns
blogger: We can find the relevant blogger to reach your target audience and implement creative integration using Revshare and CPA-based models. Our cooperation is transparent, consistent and quality oriented. We guarantee your result
set_up: We set up the context advertising, create and test creatives, analyze and improve promotion campaigns. The partner receives multidimensional marketing support: we work with marketing funnels, positioning and value proposition
monitoring: Regular campaign monitoring and deactivation of irrelevant ads
user_flow: Detailed research of the user flow
ad_types: Usage of the various ad types and campaigns in Google and Yandex: text only, visual only, combined and video ads
hypotheses: Create and test hypotheses what have been widely accepted on the market
web_awareness: We create positive web awareness for the online casino through growing appealing content and displacing negative posting from top positions in search engines
positions_analysis: Analysis of current positions in search results
comparison: Comparison of your positions with your competitors
strategy: Creation of the SERM improvement strategy
strengths_weaknesses: Research of strengths and weaknesses of the product
irrelevant_reviews: Help with deleting the irrelevant reviews
reputation_dynamics: Monitoring of search engine reputation dynamics
B2B_marketplace: is a B2B marketplace with an extensive list of IT specialists from top tier IT companies in i-gaming which could be hired both in-house or out-staffed
build_team: IGaming Management enables the involvement of remote teams to enhance project teams or build your own personal team from scratch
eliminate_barriers: We aim to eliminate barriers between companies and teams for fast, effective and professional creation of gambling projects around the world
goals_and_timeline: We determine your goals and timeline
project_manager: A project manager is appointed to lead your project
professional_team: We set up a professional team
planning_phase: Planning phase, including the general timeline, key milestones and KPIs
consultation: Send a request and book a free consultation
discuss_goals: We will answer your questions and discuss your goals
become_part: IGaming Management will help you find an interesting and reliable project where you can become part of a professional team
decision: You are to decide on the project outlook and make a final decision on your engagement whether it is the implementation of the idea or the participation in a particular team. Discuss the terms of your partnership with the project coordinator.
find_people: IIGaming Management will help you find people for your team who know and can implement various gambling products
implement: You can invite them to your startup or existing business or implement interesting ideas together. The process is simple and hassle-free: you describe the idea, write down team requirements for a desired result and receive a ready-to-go team.
higher_profit: Do business faster and with higher profit
community: We go far beyond setting up businesses and teams. We build a stronger and friendly community together
welcome: Welcome to Progressive Umoja Marketing Africa (PUMA). As part of our IGaming Management company, we have opened the first international offline training center focused on internet marketing with guaranteed employment in IGaming projects
believe_in_success: We believe in the success of everyone. We believe that everyone has the strength and talent to achieve great goals. We help find the path of professional development and self-realization in the way you desire
skills: Get new skills to improve your career
change_job: Change job and change your life
